title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in dataset, but expression builder still shows old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name:
EB: According to SCR 78193, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
